original_text: They tie up heavy burdens, hard to bear, and lay them on people's shoulders, but they themselves are not willing to move them with their finger.
korean_text: 또 무거운 짐을 묶어 사람의 어깨에 지우되 자기는 이것을 한 손가락으로도 움직이려 하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: and lay them on people's shoulders
but they themselves are not willing to move them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들 자신은 그것들을 옮기려고 하지 않습니다
